incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Multiple Networks in US Over a Subset of Toll Free and Short Code

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to multiple networks in USA over a subset of Toll Free and Short Code. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Inbound Call Failures to a Subset of Twilio Indonesian Phone Numbers

incident_updates.body: We are seeing recovery with the issue causing inbound call failures to a Subset of Twilio Indonesian phone numbers. Our Engineers are actively monitoring this issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

The issue causing inbound call failures to a Subset of Twilio Indonesian Phone Numbers phone numbers is being investigated. We are actively working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to Multiple Networks over Multiple Countries in Africa

incident_updates.body:
We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays to Multiple Networks and Countries in Africa. Our engineers are working with our carrier partners to resolve the Incidents for each affected Country. The following Countries and respective Network Operators are impacted:

- Algeria: Mobilis
- Burundi: Viettel
- Egypt: Etisalat
- Gabon: Airtel
- Guinea: MTN, Celcom
- Malawi: TNM
- Mozambique: Vodacom
- Uganda: Smart
- Zambia: MTN

We're seeing recovery for these countries:
- Tanzania: Vodacom, TTCL
- Zimbabwe: Econet

We will provide an update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Telesur Network in Suriname

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Telesur network in Suriname. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available. This is in reference to the Status page that was mistakenly marked as resolved: https://status.twilio.com/incidents/j1zgcfnnyp18

We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Telesur network in Suriname. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available. This is in reference to the Status page that was mistakenly marked as resolved: https://status.twilio.com/incidents/j1zgcfnnyp18

The Vodafone network in Qatar is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 May 2024 at 15:00 PDT until 16 May 2024 at 21:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Vodafone Qatar handsets.

The Lifecell network in Ukraine is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 May 2024 at 15:00 PDT until 16 May 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Lifecell Ukraine handsets.

The Bell network in Canada is conducting a planned maintenance from 17 May 2024 at 01:30 PDT until 17 May 2024 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Bell Canada handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Three United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 18 May 2024 at 18:30 PDT until 18 May 2024 at 22:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

Our Voice carrier partner in Australia is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 May 2024 at 05:00 PDT until 20 May 2024 at 06:59 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures from and to Twilio Australia phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Asia and Africa SMS Carrier Maintenance - Airtel

incident_updates.body: The Airtel network in Asia and Africa are conducting a planned maintenance from 20 May 2024 at 11:31 PDT until 20 May 2024 at 18:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Airtel in Asia and Africa handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner in Australia is conducting a planned maintenance from 22 May 2024 at 05:00 PDT until 22 May 2024 at 06:59 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures from and to Twilio Australia phone numbers.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 22 May 2024 at 14:00 PDT until 22 May 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Beeline Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS and MMS Carrier partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in the US and Canada is conducting a planned maintenance from 22 May 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 23 May 2024 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 May 2024 at 23:00 PDT until 24 May 2024 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following carriers and country: Rogers Canada, Telus Canada, Bell Canada.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes, Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API]

scheduled_maintenances.name: France SMS Carrier Maintenance - Bouygues Telecom

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Bouygues Telecom network in France is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 13 May 2024 at 16:00 PDT until 15 May 2024 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Bouygues Telecom France handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

13 May 2024 at 16:00 PDT until 13 May 2024 at 23:00 PDT
15 May 2024 at 16:00 PDT until 15 May 2024 at 23:00 PDT
